name: RunFromFileSystemTask
description: Run UFT One tests from file system
author: Micro Focus

inputs.name: testPathInput
inputs.label: Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of tests or folders that contain tests, to run. Each line should contain a single test, folder, or MTB file

inputs.name: timeOutIn
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout value in seconds. If left empty, there is no timeout

inputs.name: enableFailedTestsReport
inputs.label: Generate 'Failed Tests' report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to generate a report which provides information on your tests' failed steps. You can view these results in the Extensions tab.

inputs.name: uploadArtifact
inputs.label: Do you want to upload the UFT One report to the storage account?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether you want or not to upload the report on your Azure storage account.

inputs.name: artifactType
inputs.label: Artifacts to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose what artifact will be uploaded to the storage account

options.bothReportArchive: Both UFT One report and archive

inputs.name: reportFileName
inputs.label: Report file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a name for the UFT One report file

inputs.name: mcServerUrl
inputs.label: Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your Mobile Center server, in the format http[s]://(MC server name):(port)

inputs.name: mcAuthType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the authentication mode to use for connecting to UFT Mobile

inputs.name: mcUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username that will access this Mobile Center server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this Mobile Center server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcTenantId
inputs.label: Tenant Id

validation.message: This field must be a valid and positive number (maximum 2147483647)

inputs.helpMarkDown: The tenant ID used to connect to the UFT Mobile server with multi-tenant mode enabled

inputs.name: mcAccessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Access Key will provide access to this Mobile Center server during the build step run

inputs.name: useMcProxy
inputs.label: Use proxy settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to use a proxy for connecting to the Mobile Center server

inputs.name: mcProxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy Sever
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your proxy server, in the format (proxy server name):(port)

inputs.name: useMcProxyCredentials
inputs.label: Use proxy credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to specify credentials for connecting to the proxy server

inputs.name: mcProxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username that will access this proxy server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcProxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this proxy server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcDevice
inputs.label: Device
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify one single device's information

inputs.name: mcAppType
inputs.label: Launch on start
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app you want to launch automatically at the start of your test

inputs.name: mcSysApp
inputs.label: System Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pre-installed system application that you want to test on your device

inputs.name: mcApp
inputs.label: Main UFT Mobile Application
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The main application that you want to test.
Provide the app's identifier, as returned by the Get Mobile Resources task, and optionally, specify whether the app should be packaged.
**Example:**
`Identifier:"com.ebay.mobile", Packaged:"No"`

validation.message: Expected format -> Identifier:"<app identifier>", Packaged:"Yes/No" (Identifier is required, Packaged is optional)

inputs.name: mcExtraApps
inputs.label: Additional UFT Mobile Applications
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Additional applications that you want to test.
Provide the apps' identifiers, as returned by the Get Mobile Resources task, and optionally, specify whether the app should be packaged.
**Example:**
`Identifier:"com.ebay.mobile", Packaged:"No"`
`Identifier:"com.mf.iShopping", Packaged:"Yes"`
